Package org.jlab.epsci.ersap.base

Class BaseOrchestrator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jlab.epsci.ersap.base.BaseOrchestrator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable
    @ParametersAreNonnullByDefault
public class BaseOrchestrator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Base class for orchestration of applications.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BaseOrchestrator

        public BaseOrchestrator()
        Creates a new orchestrator. Uses a random name and the local node as front-end.
        Throws:
        java.io.UncheckedIOException - if localhost could not be obtained

      • BaseOrchestrator

        public BaseOrchestrator​(int subPoolSize)
        Creates a new orchestrator. Uses a random name and receives the location of the front-end.
        Parameters:
        subPoolSize - set the size of the pool for processing subscriptions on background
        Throws:
        java.io.UncheckedIOException - if localhost could not be obtained

      • BaseOrchestrator

        public BaseOrchestrator​(DpeName frontEnd)
        Creates a new orchestrator. Uses a random name and receives the location of the front-end.
        Parameters:
        frontEnd - use this front-end for communication with the ERSAP cloud
        Throws:
        java.io.UncheckedIOException - if localhost could not be obtained

      • BaseOrchestrator

        public BaseOrchestrator​(DpeName frontEnd,
                        int subPoolSize)
        Creates a new orchestrator. Uses a random name and receives the location of the front-end.
        Parameters:
        frontEnd - use this front-end for communication with the ERSAP cloud
        subPoolSize - set the size of the pool for processing subscriptions on background

      • BaseOrchestrator

        public BaseOrchestrator​(java.lang.String name,
                        DpeName frontEnd,
                        int subPoolSize)
        Creates a new orchestrator.
        Parameters:
        name - the identification of this orchestrator
        frontEnd - use this front-end for communication with the ERSAP cloud
        subPoolSize - set the size of the pool for processing subscriptions on background

      • configure

        public ErsapRequests.ServiceConfigRequestBuilder configure​(ServiceName service)
        Returns a request builder to configure the given service.
        Parameters:
        service - the ERSAP service to be configured
        Returns:
        a builder to choose how to configure the service (with data, with report frequency, etc)

      • execute

        public ErsapRequests.ServiceExecuteRequestBuilder execute​(ServiceName service)
        Returns a request builder to execute the given service.
        Parameters:
        service - the ERSAP service to be executed
        Returns:
        a builder to setup the execution request (with data, data types, etc)

      • execute

        public ErsapRequests.ServiceExecuteRequestBuilder execute​(Composition composition)
        Returns a request builder to execute the given composition.
        Parameters:
        composition - the ERSAP composition to be executed
        Returns:
        a builder to configure the execute request (with data, data types, etc)

      • listen

        public ErsapSubscriptions.ServiceSubscriptionBuilder listen​(ErsapName service)
        Returns a subscription builder to select what type of reports of the given service shall be listened, and what action should be called when a report is received.
        Parameters:
        service - the service to be listened
        Returns:
        a builder to select a service subscription

      • listen

        public ErsapSubscriptions.GlobalSubscriptionBuilder listen()
        Returns a subscription builder to select what type of global reports by the front-end shall be listened, and what action should be called when a report is received.
        Returns:
        a builder to select a global subscription

      • query

        public ErsapQueries.ErsapQueryBuilder query()
        Returns a query builder to query the registration/runtime database to discover registered components or obtain the registration/runtime information.

        To create the query use a filter from ErsapFilters to filter which components should be selected, or a ErsapName for a specific component.

        Returns:
        a builder to create the desired query

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns this orchestrator name.
        Returns:
        the name of the orchestrator

      • getFrontEnd

        public DpeName getFrontEnd()
        Returns the front-end used by this orchestrator.
        Returns:
        the name of the front-end DPE

      • getPoolSize

        public int getPoolSize()
        Gets the size of the thread-pool that process subscription callbacks.
        Returns:
        the maximum size of the thread-pool
